WalliD is your All-In-One Digital ID and Crypto Wallet!

WalliD Wallet is the ultimate solution for managing your digital identity and cryptocurrency assets. With our self-custodial aggregator wallet, you can seamlessly authenticate on both web2 and web3 platforms while keeping full control of your keys and data.

Web authentication for the Future: Connect to traditional or decentralized  applications (dApps) and execute blockchain transactions on EVM chains, NEAR with social logins and other IDs. Enjoy the benefits of the decentralized web seamlessly and without compromising security.

Effortless Crypto Token Management: Send, receive, and view balances of native, ERC-20, NFTs, and Soulbound tokens directly within your WalliD wallet.

Streamlined Digital ID Management: Take control of your digital identity with WalliD. Easily claim, prove ownership, and view Digital IDs, social network accounts, digital certificates, verifiable credentials, and badges from multiple trusted sources.

Unparalleled Security and Privacy: With WalliD, you are the sole custodian of your keys and assets. Rest easy knowing that no third party can access your tokens or ID data without your explicit permission.

Discover the power and convenience of WalliD today. Simplify your digital life and explore the endless possibilities of the blockchain world with confidence. Get started now!
